# xenserver Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "xenserver" {
  host     = "https://1.1.1.1"
  username = "root"
  password = "test123"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String) The URL of target Xenserver host
- `password` (String, Sensitive) The password of target Xenserver host
- `username` (String) The user name of target Xenserver host
